item.title: Daniel Negreanu interview!
item.itunes:author: The Poker Guys
item.itunes:summary:
Timestamps:
1:30 The trouble with all DN’s hands being on TV and how he adjusts
4:00 Dealing with pressure while playing the One Drop and his deep 2015 Main event run
6:00 The November 10?
8:00 Why he played his 2015 ME bust out hand the way he did
10:00 Shaun Deeb and angle shooting
11:00 “I hate Mike Matusow with a passion”
12:00 Biggest poker regret
13:00 Fedor Holz’s incredible run
15:00 Thoughts on Phil Hellmuth “…I know he’s gonna hate me saying that…”
16:00 Best play he’s ever made?
18:00 Craziest live poker experience?
20:00 Most embarrassing play he’s ever made?
23:00 Does Dnegs ever feel nervous during a big bluff?
25:00 Why he has such a friendly poker demeanor
item.itunes:subtitle:
Timestamps:
1:30 The trouble with all DN’s hands…
item.description:
Timestamps:
1:30 The trouble with all DN’s hands being on TV and how he adjusts
4:00 Dealing with pressure while playing the One Drop and his deep 2015 Main event run
6:00 The November 10?
8:00 Why he played his 2015 ME bust out hand the way he did
10:00 Shaun Deeb and angle shooting
11:00 “I hate Mike Matusow with a passion”
12:00 Biggest poker regret
13:00 Fedor Holz’s incredible run
15:00 Thoughts on Phil Hellmuth “…I know he’s gonna hate me saying that…”
16:00 Best play he’s ever made?
18:00 Craziest live poker experience?
20:00 Most embarrassing play he’s ever made?
23:00 Does Dnegs ever feel nervous during a big bluff?
25:00 Why he has such a friendly poker demeanor

item.title: (Re-release) William Kassouf podcast featuring Zachary Elwood
item.itunes:author: The Poker Guys
item.itunes:summary: We did this podcast with tells expert Zach Elwood back in November, but it was lost in our old feed. We thought it was cool, so we are re-releasing it. YAY!
